pyrex.custom.arianna.antenna.ARIANNAAntenna.clear¶

ARIANNAAntenna.clear(reset_noise=False)¶

Reset the antenna to an empty state.

Clears all signals, noises, and triggers from the antenna state. Can also optionally recalibrate the noise so that a new signal arriving at the same times as a previous signal will not have the same noise.

Parameters:

reset_noise : boolean, optional

Whether or not to recalibrate the noise.

PyREx

A Python package for simulation of neutrinos and radio antennas in ice. Version 1.8.0
